item.title: The Green Tea Garbage Collector
item.description: Go 1.25 includes a new experimental garbage collector, Green Tea.

item.title: Flight Recorder in Go 1.25
item.description: Go 1.25 introduces a new tool in the diagnostic toolbox, flight recording.

item.title: It's survey time! How has Go has been working out for you?
item.description: Help shape the future of Go

item.title: A new experimental Go API for JSON
item.description: Go 1.25 introduces experimental support for encoding/json/jsontext and encoding/json/v2 packages.

item.title: Testing Time (and other asynchronicities)
item.description: A discussion of testing asynchronous code and an exploration of the `testing/synctest` package. Based on the GopherCon Europe 2025 talk with the same title.

item.title: Container-aware GOMAXPROCS
item.description: New GOMAXPROCS defaults in Go 1.25 improve behavior in containers.

item.title: Go 1.25 is released
item.description: Go 1.25 adds container-aware GOMAXPROCS, testing/synctest package, experimental GC, experimental encoding/json/v2, and more.

item.title: The FIPS 140-3 Go Cryptographic Module
item.description: Go now has a built-in, native FIPS 140-3 compliant mode.

item.title: Generic interfaces
item.description: Adding type parameters to interface types is surprisingly powerful
